name: Yoplait Source 0% Smooth Traditional Yogurt Vanilla 630 g

data.description: Yoplait Source 0% Smooth Traditional Yogurt is a deliciously creamy, 0% M.F. yogurt made with no added sugar. Free from fat and full of flavour, now you can enjoy wellness your way every day. Yoplait Source Yogurt makes for a great snack anytime or addition to your breakfast. Enjoy it in smoothies, or add some granola and fruit to make a tasty parfait. This traditional yogurt is a source of calcium and is perfect for the whole family to share. Yoplait Source 0% M.F. Smooth Traditional Yogurt contains one 630 g container of smooth traditional yogurt in total.

ingredients: Skim milk (skim milk, vitamin A palmitate, vitamin D3), Water, Whey proteins, Modified corn starch, Gelatin, Natural and artificial flavour, Pectin, Active bacterial culture, Lactic acid, Sucralose (14 mg per 115 g serving), Potassium sorbate, Tricalcium phosphate, *may contain Milk protein, Modified tapioca starch, Agar.

name: Snack Pack Pudding Chocolate & Butterscotch 12 x 99 g

data.description: Creamy, delicious and a perfectly sweet treat. The only problem will be deciding which one to eat. Snack Pack is gluten-free and Kosher, and made with Real milk, No preservatives, 0 grams trans fat, No high-fructose corn syrup

ingredients: Water, Skim Milk From Concentrate (Water, Concentrated Skim Milk), Sugar, Modified Corn Starch, High Oleic Sunflower Oil, Hydrogenated Palm Oil, Salt, Colour (Contains Tartrazine), Artificial And Natural Flavours, Sodium Stearoyl-2-Lactylate, Sodium Phosphate.Contains:Milk.

name: Snack Pack Pudding Cups Ice Cream Sandwich 4 x 99 g

data.description: Rich and creamy in taste sandwich ice cream dessert pudding perfect for a delicious lunch-time snack or after-dinner treat. Stock up on these Snack Pack Pudding Cups and bring a smile to snack time. Snack Pack's Ice Cream Sandwich Pudding Cups are gluten-free and made with Premium imported cocoa & No high-fructose corn syrup.

ingredients: Water, Skim Milk From Concentrate (Water, Concentrated Skim Milk), Sugar, Modified Corn Starch, Modified Palm Oil, Cocoa, Salt, Natural And Artificial Flavours, Sodium Stearoyl-Lactate, Sodium Phosphate, Titanium Dioxide, Caramel. Contains: Milk
